wikipedia_page.main: Gamal Yafai (Arabic: جمال يافعي; born 4 August 1991) is a British professional boxer. He held the European super-bantamweight title between 2020 and May 2021 and previously held the Commonwealth super-bantamweight title in 2016. As an amateur he won a bronze medal at the 2010 European Championships.

response: Yafai is the son of Yemeni parents. He currently lives in the Moseley area of Birmingham. Yafai has two brothers who are also boxers. Gamal Yafai is a professional boxer and Galal Yafai is an Olympic flyweight boxing champion. https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/olympics/58125750
**Bantamweight:  Eduard Abzalimov   Georgiy Chygayev   Andrew Selby   Gamal Yafai

response: * Gamal Yafai (born 1991), English professional boxer, brother of Galal and Khalid
Yafai was born to Yemeni parents. He is the younger brother of boxers Kal Yafai and Gamal Yafai.
